input.cv_text:
ROLE: Graduate Data Analyst
CV:
SUMMARY: Graduate seeking entry-level analytics role.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- Helped with weekly reporting.
SKILLS: Excel
input.job_description: Graduate Data Analyst: SQL, Excel, KPI reporting, data validation, Power BI preferred, stakeholder communication.

input.cv_text:
ROLE: Junior Data Analyst
CV:
SUMMARY: Career changer from customer service into analytics.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- Handled customer queries and resolved issues.
- Maintained spreadsheets to track cases.
- Escalated complex cases to senior staff.
SKILLS: Excel, Communication, Attention to detail
input.job_description: Junior Data Analyst: reporting, data quality checks, stakeholder updates, basic SQL preferred.

input.cv_text:
ROLE: Data Analyst
CV:
SUMMARY: Analyst with reporting experience using Excel and SQL.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- Built Excel models for weekly KPI packs.
- Wrote SQL queries for ad-hoc extracts.
- Validated data and documented fixes.
SKILLS: Excel, SQL, Reporting, Data validation
input.job_description:
Responsibilities: weekly KPI reporting, dashboard updates, stakeholder management, ad-hoc analysis.
Requirements: SQL, Excel, Power BI/Tableau, data modelling, ETL concepts, Python, statistics, communication, attention to detail.

input.cv_text:
ROLE: Junior Data Analyst
CV:
SUMMARY: Gradute with exel + SQL.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- wrte sql querries for repots.
- updted excel tracker.
- cheked results for erors.
SKILLS: SQL, Excel
input.job_description: Junior Data Analyst: clean and validate data, write SQL queries, weekly reporting, communicate with stakeholders.

input.cv_text:
ROLE: Business Analyst
CV:
SUMMARY: Analyst supporting reporting and requirements gathering.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- Produced weekly operational reports in Power BI.
- Gathered requirements and maintained documentation.
- Worked with stakeholders to confirm changes.
SKILLS: Power BI, Excel, Documentation, Stakeholder management
input.job_description: Business Analyst: requirements elicitation, process mapping, user stories, stakeholder workshops, Jira/Confluence preferred.

input.cv_text:
ROLE: Data Analyst
CV:
SUMMARY: Analyst with Excel and SQL reporting experience.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- Prepared weekly reports using Excel.
- Pulled data extracts using SQL.
SKILLS: Excel, SQL
input.job_description: Data Analyst: Python, SQL, Excel, Tableau, experimentation, A/B testing, stakeholder communication.

input.cv_text:
ROLE: Graduate Data Analyst
CV:
SUMMARY: Graduate in Computer Science. Took a 6-month break for personal reasons.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- University project: analysed dataset and presented findings.
SKILLS: Python, SQL, Excel
input.job_description: Graduate Data Analyst: data cleaning, basic statistics, reporting, stakeholder communication.

input.cv_text:
ROLE: Marketing Assistant
CV:
SUMMARY: Worked in marketing with basic reporting.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- Produced weekly campaign reports in Excel.
- Coordinated with teams to collect updates.
SKILLS: Excel, Communication
input.job_description: Data Analyst: SQL, data validation, KPI reporting, dashboards (Power BI), stakeholder communication.

input.cv_text:
ROLE: Junior Data Analyst
CV:
SUMMARY: Graduate with internship experience.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- Internship: extracted data using SQL for weekly reporting.
- Internship: cleaned datasets and logged issues.
- Internship: supported Power BI dashboard updates.
- Part-time: maintained trackers and improved documentation quality.
- Project: analysed trends and presented results.
SKILLS: SQL, Excel, Power BI, Communication, Attention to detail
input.job_description: Junior Data Analyst: reporting, dashboarding, data quality, stakeholder updates.

input.cv_text:
ROLE: Data Analyst
CV:
SUMMARY: Analyst with SQL and Excel skills.
EXPERIENCE BULLETS:
- Wrote SQL queries for reports.
- Built Excel dashboards.
SKILLS: SQL, Excel
input.job_description: Data Analyst role.
